game.title: The Lost Treasure

task.#text:
Objective: Decrypt the ancient map.
		 Description: Travel to the forgotten library and decipher the cryptic symbols on the ancient map.

game.#text:
Objective: Find the lost treasure of the ancient kingdom.
Description: Embark on an epic adventure to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient kingdom. Solve riddles, overcome obstacles, and outsmart the guardians to claim your reward.

	 quest-giver:Captain Rutherford
	 tasks:
